suite.name: CreateChareters

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/accounts path_url=/accounts headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '29', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "gabiru@gmail.com"}'

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: DELETE
kw.msg: DELETE Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/delorean path_url=/delorean headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '6202fe74751f850016db34f7', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '6202fe74751f850016db34f7', 'Content-Length': '102', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Christopher Sharp", "aliases": "Iron Man", "age": 1693, "team": "Avengers", "active": false}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

test.name: Cenário 2: Nao deve cadastra personagem com mesmo Nome

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '6202fe74751f850016db34f7', 'Content-Length': '106', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Reed Richards", "aliases": "Sr Fantastico", "age": 45, "team": "Fantastic Four", "active": true}'

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '6202fe74751f850016db34f7', 'Content-Length': '106', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Reed Richards", "aliases": "Sr Fantastico", "age": 45, "team": "Fantastic Four", "active": true}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
